T02D2669:181b-1: kro dha bi dza ya ka lpa gu hya tantra sya t'i k'a //
T02D2669:181b-3: khro bo rnam par gyal ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad pa /
T02D2669:181b-4: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2669:181b-5: bcom ldan 'das khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud
T02D2669:181b-6: stong phrag bcu gnyis bzhugs pa las ma 'ongs pa'i
T02D2669:181b-7: sems can rnams kyi don du slob dpon pra ti
T02D2669:181b-8: warna tsandra sa rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis
T02D2669:181b-10: shlo ka sum stong pa gcig kyang mdzad /
T02D2669:181b-11: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga
T02D2669:181b-12: shloo ka stong bzhugs pa 'di las slob dpon pra
T02D2669:181b-13: ti warna tsandras btus nas mdzad pa ste /
T02D2669:181b-14: de yang rgyud gang gi nang nas btus nas mdzad ce na /
T02D2669:181b-15: slob dpon 'chad pa dag mi mthun te /
T02D2669:181b-16: kha cig na re khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2669:181b-17: rgyud slob dpon pra ti warna tsandra nyid kyis btus
T02D2669:181b-18: te mdzad pa shloo ka sum stong bzhugs pa'i nang
T02D2669:181b-19: nas btus te / rgyud 'di mdzad do zhes kyang 'chad /
T02D2669:181b-20: kha cig na re ma nydzu shr'i'i tantra shlo ka
T02D2669:181b-21: khri drug stong bzhugs pa'i nang nas rgyud 'di mdzad
T02D2669:181b-23: de la manydzu shr'i tantra'i nang nas sbyir khro bo'i cho ga dag ni 'byung na //
T02D2669:181b-24: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga'i tshig 'di dang mthun pa kho nar mi 'byung ste /
T02D2669:181b-25: de bas na rgyud chen po dad shlo ka sum stong pa'i nang nas btus te /
T02D2669:181b-26: rgyud 'di mdzad par shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:181b-27: rgyud kyi ming nyid kyang khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud ces bya ste /
T02D2669:181b-29: khro bos ma rungs pa rnams btul nas de las rnam par rgyal bas na /
T02D2669:181b-30: rgyud kyi ming khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud ces bya ste /
T02D2669:181b-31: rgyud kri ya'i rgyud du gtogs so //
T02D2669:182a-1: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du gtogs so //
T02D2669:182a-2: de la dang po rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bstan dgos te /
T02D2669:182a-3: de yang gnas gtsang ma rigs kyi gzhal med khang gi nang na /
T02D2669:182a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so //
T02D2669:182a-5: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa me
T02D2669:182a-6: tog rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2669:182a-8: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2669:182a-9: smin mtshams kyi mdzod sbu nas 'od zer byung bas
T02D2669:182a-10: / lho phyogs kyi ngos chu bo gang g'a'i bye
T02D2669:182a-11: ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha rol
T02D2669:182a-12: na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya
T02D2669:182a-13: ba na bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du rgyas
T02D2669:182a-15: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i thad du phyin nas /
T02D2669:182a-16: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du rgyas pa'i dbang po la zhus pa /

T02D2669:182a-19: ci'i slad du 'di byung zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D2669:182a-21: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'di nas

T02D2669:182a-23: bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa'i

T02D2669:182a-26: bcom ldan 'das sh'a kya thub pa bzhugs pa'i 'od zer yin te //
T02D2669:182a-27: 'od zer 'dis khyod mi mdzed kyi khams su bcom
T02D2669:182a-28: ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa des 'gugs pa'i bskul ma
T02D2669:182a-29: yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
T02D2669:182a-31: de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2669:182a-32: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhing der mchi bar
T02D2669:182a-35: legs so legs so zhes nas /
T02D2669:182a-36: 'phags pa 'jam dpal mi mdzed kyi 'jig rten gyi
T02D2669:182a-37: khams kyi bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sbyan sngar
T02D2669:182a-38: phyin nas / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas bka' stsal pa /
T02D2669:182a-39: rigs kyi bu rang gi gsang sngags kyi sbyod pa

T02D2669:182b-1: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khro bo gshin rje gshed ces bya ba byung ste /
T02D2669:182b-2: ma rungs pa thams cad btul nas slar log ste /
T02D2669:182b-4: bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyud chen po 'chad par 'tshal na /
T02D2669:182b-5: bdag byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes nas /
T02D2669:182b-6: de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i skur gyur
T02D2669:182b-7: nas khro bo rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud chen po
T02D2669:182b-8: stong phrag bcu gnyis bshad de //
T02D2669:182b-9: de la rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa
T02D2669:182b-10: gsungs pa yang rtsa ba lnga rnams kyi rgyas par
T02D2669:182b-11: bshad do // de yang gang zhe na /
T02D2669:182b-12: de yang rtsa ba'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-13: cho ga rgyas pa'i phyi ma dang cho ga rgyas pa'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma dang /
T02D2669:182b-14: cho ga rgyas pa'i phyi ma'i phyi ma bye brag dang /
T02D2669:182b-15: cho ga rgyas pa'i phyi ma'i phyi ma'i gsang ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D2669:182b-16: 'di lngas rgyas par bshad pa las lnga po de
T02D2669:182b-17: rnams la brten nas yongs su sdud par mdzad pa'i
T02D2669:182b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skabs ni mi mthun
T02D2669:182b-19: pa yang zhig tu phye nas le'u stong phrag bcu
T02D2669:182b-20: gnyis por gsungs pa de bsdus so //
T02D2669:182b-21: de la slob dpon pra ti warna tsandras rgyud chen
T02D2669:182b-22: po stong phrag bcu gnyis po gsungs pa'i nang nas
T02D2669:182b-23: rtsa ba lnga 'byung ba'i cho ga rtsa ba lnga
T02D2669:182b-24: po nyi tshe tsam zhig dang /

T02D2669:182b-27: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud shloo ka stong
T02D2669:182b-28: bzhugs pa 'di la rtsa ba lnga po'i bshad pa'i
T02D2669:182b-29: nang nas rtsa ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i nang du
T02D2669:182b-31: le'u rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba de dang por bshad do //
T02D2669:182b-32: de bas na dang po rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u 'am /
T02D2669:182b-33: skabs ston pa de yang sa bcad rnam pa dgus bshad do //
T02D2669:182b-35: rang gi mthu nye bar bstan pa dgur byas te /
T02D2669:182b-37: bstod pa sngar byas nas gsol ba 'debs pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-40: zhu ba po'i len 'debs pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-41: snying po mthu che bar bstan pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-42: rang gi cho ga rgyas par bstan pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-43: lha rnams kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-44: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par bstan pa dang /
T02D2669:182b-46: de la de nas 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi ni zhes pa ni /
T02D2669:183a-2: lha rnams kun gyis 'dud par byed //
T02D2669:183a-3: ces pa'i bar du rang gi mthu nye bar bstan
T02D2669:183a-4: pa rgyur byas te lha rnams gzud ces bya ba'i
T02D2669:183a-5: don ston to // de la de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2669:183a-6: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'di rtsa ba'am /
T02D2669:183a-7: phyi mo stong phrag bcu gnyis bzhugs pa'i nang nas
T02D2669:183a-8: gong du skabs mi 'dra ba mang po gsungs pa'i
T02D2669:183a-9: de ma thag 'das pa'i 'phro yin pas na /
T02D2669:183a-13: tshig gi rgyan la yang de nas zhes bya /
T02D2669:183a-14: rnam pa gcig tu khro bo ma rungs pa thams cad btul nas /
T02D2669:183a-15: de'i 'og tu rgyud 'di dag bshad pas na /
T02D2669:183a-16: yang de nas zhes bya ba /
T02D2669:183a-17: dbyangs kyi sgra ni skad kyi gdangs la bya ste /
T02D2669:183a-18: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi gsung gi gdangs de thams
T02D2669:183a-19: cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa la bya

T02D2669:183a-21: ba'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal de ting nge 'dzin gang
T02D2669:183a-22: ste / la bzhugs na / khro bo 'byung bar
T02D2669:183a-23: byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2669:183a-24: ste / la bzhugs na / so // snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khro bo byung ste /
T02D2669:183a-26: khro bo 'di ming gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ste /
T02D2669:183a-27: de la khro bo la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2669:183a-28: nyon mongs pas dkris pas 'dod chags dang /
T02D2669:183a-29: zhe sdang gti mug las byung ba'i khro bo dang /
T02D2669:183a-30: ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon
T02D2669:183a-31: lam dang thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis khro bo'i
T02D2669:183a-32: tshul du bstan nas byung ba ste /
T02D2669:183a-33: de la 'dir ni sngon gyi smon lam dang /
T02D2669:183a-34: thugs rje'i dbang gis khro bor sprul te byung ba la bya'o //
T02D2669:183a-35: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi khro bo yang manydzu ra ba dang /
T02D2669:183a-36: shang mu ka la sogs pa grangs med par byung
T02D2669:183a-37: ba de dag la mi bya zhing de dag la
T02D2669:183a-38: gol du dogs pa'i phyir khro bo'i ming smos pa
T02D2669:183a-39: te / khro bo 'di'i ming gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba 'byung ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:183a-40: de la gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba'i sgra ni
T02D2669:183a-41: tshig thang log tu na dka' bzlog ces kyang ste
T02D2669:183a-43: longs spyod dang bral nas mthar med par byed pas
T02D2669:183a-44: de dag gdul ba'i phyir de dang rjes su mthun
T02D2669:183a-45: pa'i cha lugs su gtso bo'i tshul 'dzin par sprul
T02D2669:183b-0: te bstan pa na gshin rje gshed ces @183b bya'o
T02D2669:183b-1: // khro bo gshin rje gshed de'i phyag mtshan dang /
T02D2669:183b-5: phyag mtshan yang tri sh'u la dang /
T02D2669:183b-6: ral gri la sogs pa bstan pa yang me lce bzhin du 'bar ba can la /
T02D2669:183b-7: khro bo nyid kyang 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pas
T02D2669:183b-8: ma rungs pa rnams tshar gcod pa'i tshul du khros
T02D2669:183b-9: pa la bya'o // 'khrugs pa ni khros pa la bya'o //
T02D2669:183b-10: de yang ci 'dra ba'i tshul zhig tu khros she na /
T02D2669:183b-12: drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa //
T02D2669:183b-14: de la drag pa zhes pa ni khro bo de
T02D2669:183b-15: rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor nas 'byung bas na drag
T02D2669:183b-16: po'o // khro bo des pha rol po ma rungs
T02D2669:183b-17: pa rnams tshar gcod cing 'dul nus pa'i mthu dang
T02D2669:183b-18: ldan pas na mthu rtsal drag po zhes bya 'o
T02D2669:183b-19: po'o // // de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan //
T02D2669:183b-20: thams cad kyi ni lag cha shor //

T02D2669:183b-22: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i khro bo gzhan rnams kyis khro bo gshin rje gshed po mthong nas /
T02D2669:183b-23: thams cad skrag sdangs te brgyal nas lag cha shor
T02D2669:183b-24: to zhes pa de yang sems can 'dul ba'i don
T02D2669:183b-25: gshin rje'i gshed mthu che bar bstan pa'i phyir ro
T02D2669:183b-26: // de bzhin du ni 'jig rten pa'i //
T02D2669:183b-27: lha rnams lus kyis 'dud par byed //
T02D2669:183b-28: ces pa ni de la de bzhin zhes bya ba'i
T02D2669:183b-29: don ni gong du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha
T02D2669:183b-30: khro bo gzhan rnams skrag nas brgyal te /
T02D2669:183b-31: lag cha shor ba de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2669:183b-32: lha rnams kyang skrag ste sdangs nas thams cad gnas
T02D2669:183b-33: nas 'dus te / phyag btsal nas bstan pa la
T02D2669:183b-34: skyabs su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2669:183b-35: nas 'dus te / // gzhan yang thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02D2669:183b-37: gzi brjid 'bar bar phyogs khyab pa //
T02D2669:183b-38: khams gsum 'khrugs par mdzad pa mthong //
T02D2669:183b-39: zhes pa'i bar du bstod pa sngar byas nas gsol ba 'debs pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2669:183b-40: gzhan yang thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02D2669:183b-41: skrag nas bstod pa mang po byed //
T02D2669:183b-43: de la gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni gong du
T02D2669:183b-44: lha rnams thams cad 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar ma
T02D2669:183b-45: zad kyi // lha de dag skrag nas thal mo
T02D2669:183b-46: sbyar te khro bo de la bstod pa mang po
T02D2669:183b-48: de yang ji skad bstod pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las gsungs te /
T02D2669:184a-1: mang du dogs nas slob dpon gyis ma gsungs so //
T02D2669:184a-2: bstod pa de yang tshig ci 'dra ba zhig gis bstod ce na /
T02D2669:184a-3: de yang rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2669:184a-4: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas khro bo de la bstod ces pa'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-5: lha rnams de yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2669:184a-6: gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa //
T02D2669:184a-7: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha de rnams
T02D2669:184a-8: kyang khro bo de'i gzi brjid kyis gzir bzhin du
T02D2669:184a-10: de yang gang zhe na gsungs pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-11: bcom ldan bdag cag sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2669:184a-12: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs mchi//
T02D2669:184a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan ni 'jal par byas /
T02D2669:184a-14: rab tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D2669:184a-15: gzi brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab pas //
T02D2669:184a-16: khams gsum 'khrugs par mdzad pa mthong //
T02D2669:184a-17: zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i gzugs kyi bye brag la bya ste /
T02D2669:184a-18: de lta bu'i gzugs de brtul zhes bya ba'am mdzad par mthong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-19: gang tshe lha dang lha min rnams //
T02D2669:184a-21: khro bo slar yang zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D2669:184a-22: zhes pa'i bar du zhi bar gyur to zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-23: de yang lha dang lha min la sogs pa ma rungs pa rnams btul nas /
T02D2669:184a-24: skrag nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bas /
T02D2669:184a-25: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi khro bo de yang slar zhi bar gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-26: gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po zhi ba dang zhes pa nas /
T02D2669:184a-27: bdag cag the tshom chen po mchis //
T02D2669:184a-28: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni zhu ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-29: de la gzhan ni tshig gnyer gyis 'jal bar byas /
T02D2669:184a-31: ji lta bur ni mnyes par bgyid //
T02D2669:184a-32: ji ltar yang ni dang bar 'gyur //
T02D2669:184a-34: khyod lta bu drag cing mthu rtsal che ba /
T02D2669:184a-35: dngos grub rab 'bring rnam gsum stsol cing bla na
T02D2669:184a-36: med pa'i go 'phang mchog 'tshal ba'i sgrub pa pos
T02D2669:184a-39: ji ltar ni byin gyis rlob cing lha mngon du
T02D2669:184a-40: phyogs par 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs de 'tshal te
T02D2669:184a-41: / bdag cag the tshom chen po mchis //
T02D2669:184a-42: zhes pa ni zhu ba'i don to //
T02D2669:184a-43: khro bos lha rnams tshig gsan nas //
T02D2669:184b-0: gshin je gshed @184b kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D2669:184b-2: gshin rje gshed po khro bo yi //
T02D2669:184b-3: gtso po'i snying po de gzung ngo //
T02D2669:184b-4: zhes bya ba'i bar du zhus pa'i lan 'debs zhes bya ba'i don ston to //
T02D2669:184b-6: khro bos lha rnams tshig gsan nas //
T02D2669:184b-7: gshin rje gshed kyis bka' stsal nas //
T02D2669:184b-9: gong du lha rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig khro bos gsan nas /
T02D2669:184b-11: gzi brjid chen po khyed rnams kun //
T02D2669:184b-12: zhes bya ba ni de ltar lha ma srin ma
T02D2669:184b-13: rungs pa de dag bka' nyan pas khro bo zhi
T02D2669:184b-14: bar gyur to // slar bka' lan 'debs pa'i tshe
T02D2669:184b-15: dang por lha ma srin de dag gis yon tan
T02D2669:184b-16: gyi sgo nas bos pa'i tshig tu /
T02D2669:184b-17: kye gzi brjid chen po khyed rnams kun //
T02D2669:184b-19: gang tshe gsum la skyabs song ba //
T02D2669:184b-20: de yi tshe ni mi bzad pa //
T02D2669:184b-21: khro bo yid la gnas par gyis //
T02D2669:184b-23: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D2669:184b-24: nga yi yid ni zhi bar gyur //
T02D2669:184b-25: zhes bya ba'i bar du gong du /
T02D2669:184b-27: ji lta bur na mnyes par bgyis //
T02D2669:184b-28: zhes zhus pa'i lan 'debs pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2669:184b-29: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba rnams kyis de'i tshe /
T02D2669:184b-30: nga'i sku gzugs 'bar zhing mi bzad pa'i khro bo de sems la sgom par gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02D2669:184b-31: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2669:184b-32: dkon mchog yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2669:184b-34: sdug bsngal can gyi sems can thams cad bla na
T02D2669:184b-35: med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2669:184b-36: rol // nga yi yid ni zhi 'gyur gyis /

T02D2669:184b-38: 'og tu yang sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:184b-39: khyed rnams skyabs su dong ba dang //
T02D2669:184b-40: byang chub sems dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2669:184b-42: nga yi snying po yid las byung //
T02D2669:184b-43: lha rnams kun gyis gzung bar gyis //

T02D2669:185a-15: gtso bo'i snying po de bzung ngo //
T02D2669:185a-17: gshin rje'i gshed po'i khro bo rnams kyi nang nas

T02D2669:185a-37: dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung ba'i phyir //

T02D2669:185a-40: par bshad pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i don ston
T02D2669:185a-41: te // de la khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2669:185a-42: rgyud chen po khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa ste
T02D2669:185a-43: te // / snying rje dang byang chub sems dang
T02D2669:185a-44: ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis thos nas yid rab tu
T02D2669:185b-0: lha de dag gis kyang drin lan lan gyis @185b
T02D2669:185b-1: glan pa'i tshul gyis so so rtog pa dag gi

T02D2669:185b-12: de dag kyang bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02D2669:185b-13: de nyid kyi dkon mchog gsum bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2669:185b-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi rten 'jig pa zhig na /
T02D2669:185b-15: lha de dag phyag rgya dang sngags la sogs pa'i cho ga sbyar ba las /

T02D2669:185b-22: de dag gi ni rtsa ba'i rgyud //

T02D2669:185b-26: rnam pa mang por byin gyis rlobs //
T02D2669:185b-27: zhes bya ba'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i don te /
T02D2669:185b-28: de la bdag gi rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba
T02D2669:185b-29: ni 'jig rten pa'i lha de dag rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D2669:185b-30: du gyur pa'i khro bo rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud
T02D2669:185b-32: ci'i phyir de dag gi rtsa ba'i rgyud du gyur pa zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2669:185b-33: dang por lha de rnams btul nas so so'i snying po dang /

T02D2669:185b-35: khro bo 'i rgyud du bshad pas na khro bo

T02D2669:186a-0: khro bo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnams kyis @186a *
T02D2669:186a-1: // sngon yang khro bo rnams phyag byas shing khro bo de'i zhal nas /

T02D2669:186a-5: zhal nas ji bzhin thos nas kyang //
T02D2669:186a-7: khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa'i rgyud dang /
T02D2669:186a-8: byang chub sems 'di rtogs rnams kyis //
T02D2669:186a-9: snying rjes de bzhin rgyas pa dang /
T02D2669:186a-10: rnam pa mang pos byin gyis brlabs //

T02D2669:186a-27: phyag rgya la sogs pa bsam pa dang /

T02D2669:186a-31: sngar dbang bskur nas gsang sngags sbyin pa dang /
T02D2669:186a-32: bla ma la mchod pa dang /
T02D2669:186a-33: slar mchod pa byas nas lha slar btang ba dang /

T02D2669:186a-43: bye brag tu gleng pa rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2669:186a-44: de la dang po spyir gleng ba ston te /

T02D2669:186a-46: 'jam dpal khro bos bshad pa yi //
T02D2669:186a-47: rtog pa rmad du byung pa'i mchog / mdor na rab tu bshad par bya //

T02D2669:186b-11: pa las kyang rmad du byung ba'i ya mtshan dag

T02D2669:186b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing blo

T02D2669:186b-15: rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis po dang /

T02D2669:186b-17: shes rab rnam gsum gyi sgo nas de dag spyod

T02D2669:186b-30: dkyil 'khor de yang ji lta bu zhig ce na /

T02D2669:186b-37: bzhin bsgrubs na dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ba la

T02D2669:186b-44: 'jig rten gsum po dag kyang 'khrug par mdzad do zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:187a-2: yi dags mang po zhes bya ba'i //
T02D2669:187a-3: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor de yi dags mang po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
T02D2669:187a-4: de la ci'i phyir yi dags mang po zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2669:187a-5: dkyil 'khor 'dir yi dags mang po 'byung bas na yi dags mang po smos te /
T02D2669:187a-6: dkyil 'khor nyid du yang be con phyag rgya 'dri
T02D2669:187a-7: ba ni nyung yi dags ni mang du 'dri bas
T02D2669:187a-8: na nyung ngu'i bzlas pa mang po smos te /
T02D2669:187a-9: de bas na yi dags mang po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02D2669:187a-10: yi dags des kyang sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi
T02D2669:187a-11: slad du ye shes kyi sprul ba yin par bshad
T02D2669:187a-12: do // thams cad du ni dkyil 'khor 'di //

T02D2669:187a-16: der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya //
T02D2669:187a-17: zhes bya ba'i bar du sa brtag pa'i don bstan te /

T02D2669:187a-23: gyi gnas de sngags pas thog ma nyid du sa

T02D2669:187a-30: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i gnas thams cad la bya'o //
T02D2669:187a-31: de la shing gcig ces bya ba ni shing rigs che ba aa shvattha la sogs pa dang /

T02D2669:187a-36: lo ma dang ma 'dres pa snga dro shing gzhan
T02D2669:187a-37: gyi grib mas ma phog pa'i shing gcig 'gred lo
T02D2669:187a-38: ma mang po mgo zlum por skyes pa la bya'o
T02D2669:187a-39: // bzhi mdo dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2669:187a-40: rgyun lugs kyi lam po che bzhin rgya gram du yod pa la bya'o//
T02D2669:187a-41: mu gnyis dang zhes pa ni /
T02D2669:187a-42: chu rlung 'bab pa'i pha rol tshu rol gyi 'gram
T02D2669:187a-43: gnyis las gang yang rung ba'i 'gram du bsgrub pa
T02D2669:187a-44: la bya'o // rnam pa gcig tu na chu bo gnyis 'bab ba'i bar gyi mdo la bya ste /
T02D2669:187a-45: da yang g-yas g-yon nas 'bab pa'i 'gram dang nye
T02D2669:187b-0: ba'i bar gyi mdor gnas te @187b bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2669:187b-1: zhes pa'o // thibs po stong pa lam srang rnying //
T02D2669:187b-2: zhes pa ni nags tshal stug po mi la sogs

T02D2669:187b-4: la bya ste / thibs po la yang bya ste der gnas te /
T02D2669:187b-6: de lta bu'i gnas na yang mi dag med par gnas pa la bya'o//
T02D2669:187b-7: sngon gyi lam srang rnying ba'i bzhi mdo de dag du yang bsgrub cing gnas pa la bya'o //

T02D2669:187b-12: khyad par du yang yul gtsang mar //

T02D2669:187b-16: gtsang ma gang du sngags pa yid dga' zhing dang
T02D2669:187b-17: pa'i gnas der dkyil 'khor bri'o zhes pa'o //

T02D2669:187b-23: zhes pa'i bar du sa sbyang ba zhes bya ba'i don ston to //

T02D2669:187b-33: pa'o // kha dog snum pa lhag par bzang //

T02D2669:187b-39: ba yi lci bas byug par bya //

T02D2669:187b-47: ba'i lci ba dang bsres pas mandal la byug par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:187b-48: ci rigs par ni byug par bya //
T02D2669:187b-49: slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas la //
T02D2669:187b-51: nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang //
T02D2669:188a-2: zhes bya bas thig gdab pa'i rim pa'i don ston to //

T02D2669:188a-5: slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas la //
T02D2669:188a-6: smyung ba byas te mnyam bzhag nas //
T02D2669:188a-7: khro bo'i srung ba byin gyis brlab //
T02D2669:188a-8: ces bya ba ni de la ci rigs par ni

T02D2669:188a-10: 'khor nub mo bri zhes 'byung ba la yang sbyar

T02D2669:188a-13: dkyil 'khor bri zhing slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'dzud
T02D2669:188a-14: pa'i tshe na zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug nas 'dod
T02D2669:188a-15: / chags dang zhe sdang gti mug la sogs te /

T02D2669:188a-17: bar sems rtse gcig par mnyam par bzhag nas khro
T02D2669:188a-18: bo chen po'i skur bsgyur te /
T02D2669:188a-19: yan lag lnga la sogs pa'i sngags kyis kyang sku'i
T02D2669:188a-20: yan lag rnams su byin gyis brlab bo zhes pas
T02D2669:188a-21: so // yi dags phal zhes bya ba yi //
T02D2669:188a-22: dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri //
T02D2669:188a-24: yi dags mang po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i mchog de dus gang du bri zhe na /
T02D2669:188a-26: ci'i phyir nub mo bri zhe na /
T02D2669:188a-27: thams cad kyis mthong bar mi bya ba'i phyir yang nub mo bri ba dang /
T02D2669:188a-28: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pa yis //
T02D2669:188a-29: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thig skud smos pa ste /
T02D2669:188a-31: zar ma'i ras sam ras bal lam /
T02D2669:188a-32: thig skud sum sgril mdzes pa yis //
T02D2669:188a-33: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thig skud smos pa ste /
T02D2669:188a-34: de yang rgyu gang las bya zhe na /
T02D2669:188a-35: zar ma'i ras sam ras bal gyi skud pa sum sgril du byas la thig skud bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:188a-36: grva bzhi dang ni sgro bzhi par //
T02D2669:188a-37: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02D2669:188a-39: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi yod par dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:188a-40: de yang ji ltar thig gdab par bya zhe na /
T02D2669:188a-42: thog mar shar dang byang nas ni //
T02D2669:188a-43: lho dang nub kyi bar du'o //
T02D2669:188a-44: zhes gsungs pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig 'debs
T02D2669:188a-45: pa'i tshe slob ma 'dug pa'i gnas bstan pa ste
T02D2669:188a-46: / de yang gnas gang du 'dug par bya zhe na /
T02D2669:188b-0: shar @188b dang byang gi mtshams su ste /
T02D2669:188b-1: aa sha nar slob ma 'dug par bya ba dang /
T02D2669:188b-2: lho dang nub kyi mtshams te bden bral phyogs su slob ma 'dug par bya ba ste /
T02D2669:188b-3: ngos gnyis su slob ma 'dug ste thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2669:188b-4: 'o na slob dpon gnas gang du 'dug par bya zhe na /
T02D2669:188b-5: shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni //
T02D2669:188b-6: nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu //
T02D2669:188b-7: zhes pa ni slob dpon de shar dang lho'i mtshams su ste /
T02D2669:188b-8: me'i phyogs su 'dug par bya ba dang /
T02D2669:188b-9: nub dang byang gi mtshams su ste /
T02D2669:188b-10: rlung gi phyogs su 'dug par bya ste /
T02D2669:188b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab bo zhes gsungs so //
T02D2669:188b-12: de ltar slob dpon dang slob ma'i gnas nges par gsungs pa las /
T02D2669:188b-13: slob dpon gyi gnas gud du 'dug par mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:188b-14: de ltar slob dpon dang slob ma gnas so sor 'chad par gsungs nas /
T02D2669:188b-15: de nas phyogs dang mtshams kyi thig gdab par bya bar gsungs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:188b-17: thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams gnas /
T02D2669:188b-18: de nas kyang ni drang bar bya //
T02D2669:188b-20: de bas na phyogs bzhir rgya gram du thig gnyis gdab pa dang /
T02D2669:188b-21: mtshams bzhi nas thig gnyis gdab par bya ba ste /
T02D2669:188b-22: de ltar rgya gram du sngar thig btab nas de'i
T02D2669:188b-23: 'og tu dkyil 'khor che chung tshad dang gnas 'gras
T02D2669:188b-24: 'grus med par thig gdab pa'i phyir /
T02D2669:188b-25: thig gi tshad byas nas gru bzhi por gdab par bya ste /
T02D2669:188b-27: thig gis rab tu tshad byas te //
T02D2669:188b-28: gru bzhi por ni thig gdab bo //
T02D2669:188b-30: thig gdab pa'i thabs 'di ni seng ge lta 'og yan man bsnor te dkrugs nas bsdus te /
T02D2669:188b-31: thig gdab pa'i rim pa 'di ltar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2669:188b-32: slob dpon kha cig 'chad pa yod de de ltar yang bya'o //
T02D2669:188b-33: yang kha cig 'di ltar yang 'chad pa yod de /
T02D2669:188b-35: thog mar shar dang byang nas ni //
T02D2669:188b-36: lho dang nub kyi bar du'o //
T02D2669:188b-37: zhes pa ni dang por thig gdab pa'i go rims bstan pa ste /
T02D2669:188b-38: de la dang po shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2669:188b-39: de nas lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab /
T02D2669:188b-40: de nas nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab po zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:188b-41: de nas de'i 'og tu phyogs bzhi'i thig gnyis gdab pa dang /
T02D2669:188b-42: mtshams bzhir thig gnyis gdab par bya ste /
T02D2669:189a-2: thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas //
T02D2669:189a-3: de nas kyang ni drang bar bya //
T02D2669:189a-5: shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni //
T02D2669:189a-6: nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu //
T02D2669:189a-7: zhes bya ba de ltar thig 'debs pa'i tshe slob
T02D2669:189a-8: dpon gnas gang du 'dug par bya ba'i gnas bstan
T02D2669:189a-9: pa ste / shar dang lho'i mtshams te me lha'i phyogs su 'dug pa dang /
T02D2669:189a-10: nub dang byang gi mtshams te rlung gi phyogs su
T02D2669:189a-11: slob dpon 'dug la thig gdab par bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D2669:189a-12: // slob ma'i gnas ni 'chad pa med de /
T02D2669:189a-14: dkyil 'khor che chung med pa dang /
T02D2669:189a-15: ya yo dang 'gras 'grus med par thig gis tshad byas te /
T02D2669:189a-16: de ltar thig ma 'grus par gdab par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:189a-18: thig gis rab tu tshad byas te //
T02D2669:189a-19: gru bzhi por ni thig gdab po //
T02D2669:189a-21: de la kha cig bshad pa /
T02D2669:189a-22: thog mar shar dang byang nas ni //
T02D2669:189a-23: lho dang nub kyi bar du'o //
T02D2669:189a-25: spyir thig ji ltar gdab pa'i rtsis mgo ste /
T02D2669:189a-26: thog mar shar gyi ngos thig gdab /
T02D2669:189a-27: de nas lho'i ngos kyi thig gdab /
T02D2669:189a-28: de nas nub kyi ngos kyi thig gdab pa ste /
T02D2669:189a-29: de ltar thig gdab po dgos pa yang gsungs pa /
T02D2669:189a-30: thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas //
T02D2669:189a-31: de bzhin du ni drang bar bya //
T02D2669:189a-32: shar dang lho yi mtshams dag tu /
T02D2669:189a-33: thig gis rab tu tshad byas te //
T02D2669:189a-34: gru bzhi por ni thig gdab po //
T02D2669:189a-36: de la shar lho'i mtshams su 'dug pa dang /
T02D2669:189a-37: nub byang gi mtshams rlung gi phyogs su 'dug pa dang /
T02D2669:189a-38: shar phyogs dang byang phyogs kyi ngos thig sngar gdab pa'o //
T02D2669:189a-39: lho dang nub gnyis su smos su zin kyang gong
T02D2669:189a-40: du smos pa'i spyi'i rtsis mgo gdab par mngon pas
T02D2669:189a-41: lho dang nub gnyis kyang thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2669:189a-42: thig gdab pa'i thabs dag ni gong du gnas pa dag dang mthun bar zad do //
T02D2669:189a-43: dkyil 'khor gyi ngos gcig gi tshad ji tsam yod pa las dgu char bgos la /
T02D2669:189a-45: sgo de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis sgo khyud kyi mar 'dren pa dang /
T02D2669:189a-46: thad kar 'dren pa dag gi tshad kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:189b-0: rim pa gcig pa mdzes @189b pa la //
T02D2669:189b-2: lhag ma rnams ni bcad par bya //
T02D2669:189b-3: zhes pa'i bar du ni de ltar gong du dkyil
T02D2669:189b-4: 'khor thig gdab pa de yang rim pa gcig pa
T02D2669:189b-5: sgo bzhi btod pa la lho phyogs kyi sgo phye
T02D2669:189b-6: la / sgo lhag ma gsum po rnams bcad pa'o //
T02D2669:189b-7: de la lho phyogs kyi sgo dbye ba yang slob
T02D2669:189b-8: ma rnams de nas bzung ba'i phyir sgo dbye ste
T02D2669:189b-9: / lho phyogs kyi sgo tshon gyis bcad la sngags dang phyag rgyas phye ste /
T02D2669:189b-11: yang na tshon mi 'byed par sgo phye la bya ste /
T02D2669:189b-12: de gnyi ga ltar sgo phye yang rung ste /
T02D2669:189b-14: gong du smos pa'i las brgyad pa gang byed kyang rung ste /
T02D2669:189b-15: lho phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la las bya'o //
T02D2669:189b-18: padmo dang ni phyogs bzhi'i sgo //
T02D2669:189b-19: the tshom med par mnyam par bya //
T02D2669:189b-20: zhes pa ni ya yo 'gras 'grus med par dkyil 'khor de re'u mig dgur bgos la /
T02D2669:189b-21: dbus kyi re'u mig la padma 'dab brgyad pa bri'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:189b-22: de ltar re'u mig dgur bgos pa'i ngos bzhi dbus cha gcig gi tshad du bya'o //
T02D2669:189b-23: dbus kyi padmo de dang phyogs bzhi sgo byang thad sgor khar drang du 'bab par 'gras 'grus dang /
T02D2669:189b-24: ya yo med par mnyam par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:189b-25: mdzes byed sgo yi phyed du bya //
T02D2669:189b-27: nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang //
T02D2669:189b-28: mdzes byed kyang ni 'dra bar bya'o //
T02D2669:189b-29: zhes pa ni de ltar dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la
T02D2669:189b-30: sgo bzhi btod pa sgo khyud bcad pa dang bcas
T02D2669:189b-31: par byas la // sgo gtod pa ni kha drang
T02D2669:189b-32: du sgo'i byang thad kyis ma 'grus pa de'i sa
T02D2669:189b-33: stong pa la mdzes byed ces bya'o //
T02D2669:189b-34: ci'i phyir mdzes byed ces bya zhe na /
T02D2669:189b-35: sgo'i sa stong ba des dkyil 'khor mdzes par byed pa'am /
T02D2669:189b-36: dkyil 'khor kyi rgyan du gyur pas na mdzes byed ces bya'o //
T02D2669:189b-37: mdzes byed de'i tshad ji tsam du bya zhe na /
T02D2669:189b-38: sgo'i phyed du bya zhes gsungs te /
T02D2669:189b-39: sgo'i phyed kyi cha gcig gi zhing gis mdzes byed kyang de tsam du bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:189b-40: 'gram pa ni sgo khyud du mar 'dren pa la bya'o //
T02D2669:189b-42: sgo khyud kyi 'gram pa gnyis dang padma gcig zhing mnyam par bya ste /
T02D2669:189b-43: sgo khyud du thad kar drangs pa dang /
T02D2669:190a-1: bya bar mar drangs pa gnyis kyi tshad kyang sgo phyed du zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:190a-5: rta babs la nye bar mdzes byed ces bya ste /
T02D2669:190a-6: de'i tshad ni ji tsam du bya zhe na /
T02D2669:190a-7: de yang sgo'i byang thad du mdzes byed de'i tshad dang mnyam par bya'o //
T02D2669:190a-8: rta babs kyi rgyan du chu srin gyis brgyan par bya ste /
T02D2669:190a-9: rgyan de dag kyang sgo dbab pa'i tshad dang mnyam
T02D2669:190a-10: par chu srin gyi rgyan rnams kyi rta babs kyis
T02D2669:190a-11: brgyan par bya'o // de bas na gsungs pa /
T02D2669:190a-12: nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang //
T02D2669:190a-13: mdzes byed dang ni 'dra bar bya //
T02D2669:190a-15: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor de //
T02D2669:190a-16: kun du thig ni gdab nas kyang //
T02D2669:190a-18: dur khrod thal bas dngar te bri //
T02D2669:190a-19: de phyir yi dags phal chen yin //
T02D2669:190a-20: zhes bya ba'i bar du phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dgod pa'i don ston te /
T02D2669:190a-22: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor de /
T02D2669:190a-23: kun du thig ni btab nas kyang //
T02D2669:190a-25: slob dpon nyid khrus bya ba dang lha'i skur bsgyur
T02D2669:190a-26: ba la sogs pa cho ga bzhin du byas pas
T02D2669:190a-27: dkyil 'khor de gong du smos pa'i tshul du thig
T02D2669:190a-30: de 'og sngags pas dur khrod kyi //
T02D2669:190a-31: thal ba gcig pus dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2669:190a-34: phyi nas tshul bzhin rig 'dzin gyis //
T02D2669:190a-35: dur khrod thal bas bri ba ni //
T02D2669:190a-37: de la dur khrod kyi thal ba ni mi ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la bya'o //
T02D2669:190a-38: rtag tu shar byang la sogs pa //
T02D2669:190a-39: gru bzhi'i nang ni de dag tu //
T02D2669:190a-40: mkhas pas be con phyag rgya bri //
T02D2669:190a-41: zhes pa ni bsgrub pa'am las gang byed kyang rung ste /
T02D2669:190a-42: las de dag byed pa'i tshe rtag tu dkyil 'khor de'i nang gi shar byang gi mtshams dang /
T02D2669:190a-43: shar lho la sogs pa'i mtshams la nang rol gyi
T02D2669:190a-44: grva bzhir sngags pas be con gyi phyag rgya bzhi
T02D2669:190a-45: dur khrod kyi thal bas bri par bya ste /
T02D2669:190a-46: de yang ji lta bu bzhi bri zhe na /
T02D2669:190a-47: dbyug pa'i mgo la skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu rgyas pa /
T02D2669:190a-48: shun pa shus pa lta bu'i sul can zlum pos
T02D2669:190a-49: brgyan pa'i steng na mi'i thod pa can gyi dbyug
T02D2669:190a-50: pa bzhi chad zungs can padma'i steng na bzhugs pa
T02D2669:190a-51: bzhi char yang kha nang du bltas par bri'o //
T02D2669:190b-0: @190b dbyug pa 'di bzhi yang a'arya manydz'u shr'i ya m'anta ka'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2669:190b-1: de ltar bris nas bsgrub pa'am las byed pa'i tshe
T02D2669:190b-2: phyogs bzhi nas byin gyis brlab cing gdon bgegs kyis
T02D2669:190b-4: phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dags gzhag / ces pa
T02D2669:190b-5: ni phyogs kyi sgo bzhir yi dags re re ste
T02D2669:190b-7: de dag kun kyang kha nang du bltas par bri'o //
T02D2669:190b-8: gzhan yang yi dags lnga pa ni //
T02D2669:190b-9: padma'i steng du bsam par bya //
T02D2669:190b-10: zhes pa ni gong du sgo'i yi dags bzhi po
T02D2669:190b-11: ma gtogs pa'i yi dags lnga pa de'i dbus kyi
T02D2669:190b-12: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du bsam par bya'o
T02D2669:190b-13: zhes pa ste yi dags de yang glo g-yon pa
T02D2669:190b-16: gdong lho phyogs su lta bar bri'o //
T02D2669:190b-17: de la bsam pa ni ri mo bris la byas pas na /
T02D2669:190b-18: bsam pa gcig pu mi bya bar dur khrod du
T02D2669:190b-19: thal bas phyi'i ri mo yang bya'o zhes pa ste
T02D2669:190b-20: / phyag rgya'i mtshan ma kun la de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2669:190b-21: de bzhin phyi sgo'i nang dag tu //
T02D2669:190b-22: phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du //
T02D2669:190b-23: zhes pa ni gong du yi dags bri ba der yang ma zad de /
T02D2669:190b-24: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor du sgo'i nang be con
T02D2669:190b-25: bzhi'i bar bar du phyogs bzhi'i gnas su de dag
T02D2669:190b-26: thams cad du be con la thug thug tu mi
T02D2669:190b-28: yi dags gnyis spel zhing dur khrod kyi thal bas
T02D2669:190b-29: ji tsam shong shong du dngar te bri'o zhes pa
T02D2669:190b-30: ste / de bas na gsungs pa //
T02D2669:190b-31: mi ro mgo med yi dags rnams //
T02D2669:190b-32: dur khrod thal pas dngar te bri //
T02D2669:190b-34: dkyil 'khor de'i ming yang de'i phyir na yi dags phal bo che'i dkyil 'khor yin zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:190b-36: de'i phyir yi dags phal chen yin //
T02D2669:190b-38: khru gang la sogs rim pa nas //
T02D2669:190b-39: khru brgyad pa yi rim pa ste //
T02D2669:190b-40: de las lhag par yongs ma gsungs //
T02D2669:190b-42: khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun //
T02D2669:190b-43: sbyin byed mchog tu shes par bya //
T02D2669:190b-44: zhes bya ba'i phyir du las kyi bye brag gi
T02D2669:190b-45: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad nges par bya zhes pa'i don
T02D2669:190b-47: khru gang la sogs rim pa nas //
T02D2669:190b-48: khru brgyad pa yi bar du ste //
T02D2669:190b-49: dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor yang mi bri //
T02D2669:191a-1: 'byung ba'i las rnams la dkyil 'khor so sor bya
T02D2669:191a-2: ba'i tshad kyang khru gang nas khru gsum pa la
T02D2669:191a-3: sogs pa yan chad bri bar bya ste /
T02D2669:191a-4: de las lhag par yang mi bri zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191a-5: rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni //
T02D2669:191a-6: khru gang bar ni bri bar bya //
T02D2669:191a-8: bdag sngon du sngar bsnyen pa'i tshe'am mchod pa dag
T02D2669:191a-9: byed 'dod pa'i tshe gong du bshad pa bzhin du
T02D2669:191a-11: ngos bzhi la ngos gcig gi tshad khru gang bar bri zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191a-12: las rnams so so la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad mi mthun par gsungs pa yang /
T02D2669:191a-13: las gces pa'i rim pas sam /
T02D2669:191a-14: che rim kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:191a-15: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02D2669:191a-16: mi skyong bsgrub pa khru dor bya //
T02D2669:191a-17: zhes pa ni zhi ba dang /
T02D2669:191a-19: rgyal po dbang du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2669:191a-20: de dag bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ngos gcig gi tshad la khru do bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191a-21: khru do man chad khru brgyad yan chad gang yang rung ste //
T02D2669:191a-22: gcig gi nang du slob ma rnams gzud par bya'o //
T02D2669:191a-23: de ltar yang gang yang rung mod kyi /
T02D2669:191a-24: khru brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du slob ma rnams gzud bar bstan to //
T02D2669:191a-25: sems can kun gyi bskrad pa dang //
T02D2669:191a-26: de bzhin bzhi la khru gsum pa //
T02D2669:191a-27: zhes bya ba de lha 'dre dang mi la sogs pa rnams gnas nas bskrad par bya ba dang /
T02D2669:191a-28: gnas de nas gtan med par bya ba'am /
T02D2669:191a-29: phung bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor khru gsum par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191a-30: khru bzhi dbang dang dgug pa la //
T02D2669:191a-31: las rnams kyi ni mchog tu gsungs//
T02D2669:191a-32: zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2669:191a-33: dgug pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bri ba ni las rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs zhes bya'o //
T02D2669:191a-34: khru lnga nad dang mi nad dang /
T02D2669:191a-35: dgra rnams med par gsad pa'i mchog //
T02D2669:191a-38: mi nad chen po klung ba byung ba dang /
T02D2669:191a-39: dgra rnams med par gsad par bya ba'i phyir dkyil
T02D2669:191a-40: 'khor khru lnga par bya ba ni mchog ces bya'o
T02D2669:191a-41: // khru drug bgegs rnams thams cad dang //
T02D2669:191a-42: gdon bgegs nges par zlog par byed //
T02D2669:191a-44: gdon bgegs rnams nges pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2669:191b-0: dkyil 'khor @191b khru drug par bri bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191b-1: khru bdun pa ni lha yi rnams //
T02D2669:191b-2: dbang du dgug pa'i las rnams byed //
T02D2669:191b-3: ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams dgug pa dang /
T02D2669:191b-4: dbang du bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor khru bdun par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191b-5: khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun //
T02D2669:191b-6: sbyin byed mchog tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:191b-7: zhes pa ni dngos grub rab 'bring rnam pa gsum
T02D2669:191b-8: la sogs pa kun sbyin par byed pa'i mchog tu
T02D2669:191b-9: gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor khru brgyad par bri'o zhes
T02D2669:191b-10: pa'o // las 'di rnams so sor byed pa'i tshe /
T02D2669:191b-11: dang por dkyil 'khor lan cig bris nas las de grub grub tu gzhag pa'am /
T02D2669:191b-12: yang na ri mo de mi mngon zhing rnying por
T02D2669:191b-13: gyur na skabs skabs su brje bar bya ba ni
T02D2669:191b-14: sbyi'i rgyud dang sbyar zhing gar legs par bya'o //
T02D2669:191b-15: de ltar ci rigs bris nas ni //
T02D2669:191b-16: de nas gtsang mas nye reg bya //
T02D2669:191b-18: gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs /
T02D2669:191b-19: sbyar thug la sogs lhag ma dbul //
T02D2669:191b-20: zhes bya ba'i bar du mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:191b-22: ci rigs par ni bris nas ni //
T02D2669:191b-23: de nas gtsang mas nye reg bya //
T02D2669:191b-24: zhes pa ni de ltar gong du smos pa'i dkyil
T02D2669:191b-25: 'khor rnams las gang yang rung ba cig ci rigs
T02D2669:191b-26: par bris nas / de'i 'og tu phyi nang bcas
T02D2669:191b-27: par gtsang ma'i slob dpon de yang sngags dang phyag
T02D2669:191b-29: 'og nas 'byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi tshogs rnams bsags par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:191b-30: mchod pa'i yo byad de dag kyang dkyil 'khor bris
T02D2669:191b-31: pa'i 'og tu gdod 'phral la btsal zhing bsogs pa
T02D2669:191b-32: la mi bya'o // mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs
T02D2669:191b-33: pa 'di dag kyang dkyil 'khor ma bris pa'i sngon
T02D2669:191b-34: rol nas btsal zhing bsogs pa la bya'o //
T02D2669:191b-35: chu yi phyir ni chu yi snod //
T02D2669:191b-36: chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya //
T02D2669:191b-37: zhes pa ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i bum pa chu dang /
T02D2669:191b-38: aa rgha dang bsang gtor bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2669:191b-39: ji tsam du chu'i snod du bya ba de dag
T02D2669:191b-40: so so gang rigs pa snod gtsang ma'i snod du
T02D2669:191b-41: dri'i chu la sogs pas rab tu dgang bar bya'o
T02D2669:191b-42: zhes pa'o // de bzhin me tog don du yang //
T02D2669:191b-43: me tog sdu gu dri zhi ma dang //
T02D2669:191b-44: me tog phreng bas snod mchog gzhan /
T02D2669:192a-1: par gang zhing mdzes par bya //
T02D2669:192a-3: me tog gi ngon du me tog kha dog sdug cing dri zhim pa'i sil mas mchod pa dang /
T02D2669:192a-4: slob ma dbang bskur ba la dgos pa'i phyir me
T02D2669:192a-5: tog de lta bu las me tog gi phreng ba
T02D2669:192a-6: byas pa dag / gong du smos pa'i mchod yon
T02D2669:192a-7: gyi snod las gzhan pa rin po che la sogs
T02D2669:192a-8: pa las byas pa'i snod mchog gi nang du mdzes
T02D2669:192a-9: shing sdug par legs par dgang bar bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D2669:192a-10: // gang du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang las kyi
T02D2669:192a-11: khyad par las me tog rigs phye ba med de
T02D2669:192a-12: // / me tog 'di lta bu zhig ni dkyil
T02D2669:192a-13: 'khor thams cad la mchod pa'i tshe dbul bar bya'o
T02D2669:192a-14: // / // dri yi snod du tsandan mchog / tsandan dkar po dmar po blang //
T02D2669:192a-15: zhes pa ni dri'i snod du tsandan te /
T02D2669:192a-16: de yang dri chung zhing ngan pa dang /
T02D2669:192a-17: rul pa la sogs pa skyon med pa tsandan bzang po mchog ces smos te /
T02D2669:192a-18: des ni tsandan gyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D2669:192a-19: tsandan dkar po dang dmar po gnyis blang zhing ba sogs par bya'o //
T02D2669:192a-20: de yang tsandan dkar po ni zhi ba dang /
T02D2669:192a-21: rgyas pa dag gi tshe sbyar /
T02D2669:192a-22: dmar po ni dbang dang drag shul spyod pa dag la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2669:192a-23: aa ka ru dang sbyar ba yi //
T02D2669:192a-24: gu gul bdug pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2669:192a-25: zhes pa ni aa ka ru dang gu gul du
T02D2669:192a-26: sbyar ba'i bdug pa'ang de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o
T02D2669:192a-27: zhes pa'o // mar me mar gyi mar me dang //
T02D2669:192a-28: zhes pa ni de la mar me gang gis bya zhe na /
T02D2669:192a-29: mar gyi mar me dang zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:192a-30: de yang ba mar las mar me bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:192a-32: zhes pa ni snying po de yang 'jar 'jur med
T02D2669:192a-33: cing thag thug med par ras gtsang ma las byas
T02D2669:192a-34: pa snying po de yang 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang
T02D2669:192a-35: / legs par bkal bar sngags pas bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2669:192a-36: drag po yi ni las dag la //
T02D2669:192a-37: mi yi tshil gyis bya bar bshad //
T02D2669:192a-38: ces bya ba ni drag shul sbyod pa'i me mar
T02D2669:192a-39: gyi snying po dang dur khrod kyi ras la bya'o
T02D2669:192a-40: // drag shul spyod pa'i las la mar me yang
T02D2669:192a-41: mi'i tshil bu bzhu bas mar me bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D2669:192a-42: // // dbang la til mar bya bar bshad //
T02D2669:192a-43: gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs //
T02D2669:192a-44: sbyar thug la sogs khyad par dbul //
T02D2669:192b-0: gong du bshad @192b pa'i las gang byed kyang rung ste /
T02D2669:192b-2: gtor ma la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2669:192b-3: de la gtor ma zhes bya ba ni lha bshos la yang bya /
T02D2669:192b-4: gtor ma dngos la bya bas na /
T02D2669:192b-5: da 'dir yang lha bshos su 'byor pa dkyil 'khor du dbul ba dang /
T02D2669:192b-6: phye zan gyi gtor ma yang bya'o //
T02D2669:192b-7: nya dang sha la sogs pa ni sha dang nya bcos pa dang /
T02D2669:192b-8: ma btsos pa dag las mchod par dbul gtor ma yang bya'o //
T02D2669:192b-9: de la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni /
T02D2669:192b-11: sha dang sbyar thug med du mi rung ba la gtsor smos su zad do //
T02D2669:192b-12: de las gzhan pa'i 'byor pa'i gtor ma yang bya'o //
T02D2669:192b-13: sbyar te dbul zhing gtor ma yang bya bar bshad do //
T02D2669:192b-16: gsum bzhi'o ma las blangs pa'i sbyar thug yang khyad
T02D2669:192b-17: dam lhag par yang dbul bar bya'o zhes pa ste
T02D2669:192b-19: sbyar thug la sogs lhag par dbul //
T02D2669:192b-21: de ltar de ni tshogs sogs nas //
T02D2669:192b-22: de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yi //
T02D2669:192b-24: de'i 'og tu rang gi sngags rnams kyi /
T02D2669:192b-25: byin gyis rlob tu gzhug par bya //
T02D2669:192b-26: zhes bya ba'i bar du phyag rgyal sogs pa bsam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:192b-28: de ltar der ni tshogs bsags nas //
T02D2669:192b-29: zhes bya ba la gong ma dang 'phro sbyar ba'i tshig ste /
T02D2669:192b-30: gong du smos shing bshad pa ltar dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2669:192b-31: nye 'khor du mchod pa'i yo byad kyi tshogs rnams
T02D2669:192b-33: byang chub sems la dmigs nas ni //
T02D2669:192b-34: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dang ldan par byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:192b-35: ri mo yi ni las rnams dag / gal te 'dri bar mi nus na //
T02D2669:192b-36: zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor der
T02D2669:192b-37: dbus kyi yi dags dag sgo bzhi'i yi dags dang
T02D2669:192b-38: / be con gyi nang gi phyogs bzhi'i mgon med pa'i lus dang /
T02D2669:192b-39: yi dags spel zhing bri bar bshad pa rnams ri
T02D2669:192b-40: mo dag ma shes te bri bar ma nus na
T02D2669:192b-41: phyag rgya bkod la bsam par bya ba'i thabs bshad
T02D2669:192b-42: do // de la bsam par bya na dang por dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2669:193a-0: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad bri ba la sogs pa'i cho ga @193a * //
T02D2669:193a-1: snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2669:193a-2: sngags pa nyid lho phyogs kyi sgor 'dug ste /
T02D2669:193a-3: phyogs bcur sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D2669:193a-4: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par byas te /
T02D2669:193a-5: yi dags dgod pa rnams 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul du sems kyis bsam par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:193a-6: yi dags phal chen dbus dag tu //
T02D2669:193a-7: padma sngar bris gang yin la //
T02D2669:193a-8: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor de'i ming yi dags
T02D2669:193a-9: phal chen zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D2669:193a-10: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa sngar bris pa gang yin
T02D2669:193a-11: pa de'i steng du sngags pas yi dags yid kyis
T02D2669:193a-12: bsam par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:193a-14: de yi steng du yi dags ni //
T02D2669:193a-15: mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par bya'o //
T02D2669:193a-17: de la dbus kyi yi dags ni glo g-yon pa 'og tu gcug la /
T02D2669:193a-18: mgo shar phyogs su bstan te kha lho phyogs su lta ba'i tshul du bsam mo //
T02D2669:193a-19: de ltar yid kyis bsams pa 'ba' zhig gis mi chog ste /
T02D2669:193a-20: dbus kyi yi dags kyi sngags 'og nas 'byung bas yi dags de'i snying gar gsal bar bsams la /
T02D2669:193a-21: bdag gis kyang sngags brjod de yi dags bsam par bya'o //
T02D2669:193a-22: de ltar byas na yi dags nyid der 'ongs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:193a-24: yi dags kyi ni sngags mchog gis //
T02D2669:193a-25: bsam pa dag ni byas nas kyang //
T02D2669:193a-27: grva'i dbyug pa skyu ru ra 'dra ba'i yid kyis
T02D2669:193a-28: brgyan pa'i mi'i thod pa can bzhi bsam pa'i sngags
T02D2669:193a-29: / 'og nas 'byung ba rnams dbyug pa thod pa
T02D2669:193a-30: can bsams pa'i steng du gsal bar yang bsam zhing
T02D2669:193a-31: / / sngags de dag kyang bdag gis brjod cing bsams na /
T02D2669:193a-32: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dbyug pa thod pa can de
T02D2669:193a-33: yang dag par gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob
T02D2669:193a-36: grva yi dbyug pa bzhi po yang //
T02D2669:193a-37: sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya //
T02D2669:193a-39: dbus kyi yi dags dang grva'i dbyug pa bzhi po
T02D2669:193a-40: dag dngos su ri mo 'dri nus te bris na
T02D2669:193a-41: yang bris pa de snying ga dang /
T02D2669:193b-0: steng du gong du bshad pa bzhin @193b du so so'i sngags bsam zhing /
T02D2669:193b-1: bdag gis kyang sngags brjod de bsam par bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:193b-3: gal te 'dri bar nus na ni //
T02D2669:193b-4: sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya //
T02D2669:193b-6: de yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:193b-7: sgo bzhir yi dags bzhi po yang //
T02D2669:193b-8: gal te dngos su 'dri nus na //
T02D2669:193b-9: yi dags dngos der 'ong zhing gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2669:193b-10: byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i so so'i sngags bzhi
T02D2669:193b-11: po 'og nas 'byung bas yi dags de dag so
T02D2669:193b-14: brjod de bsams na yi dags de dag kyang yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:193b-16: sgo yi yi dags bzhi po yang //
T02D2669:193b-17: dbus su 'dri bar ma nus na //
T02D2669:193b-18: de bzhin yi dags 'dzin sngags gyis //
T02D2669:193b-19: byin gyis rlob par byed par gsungs //
T02D2669:193b-21: sgo'i yi dags dngos su 'dri nus su zin kyang so so'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2669:193b-22: da ni sbyan drangs pa sngar byas nas //
T02D2669:193b-23: dad pa lha'i rang bzhin bsgom pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2669:193b-24: de ltar cho ga bzhin bsams nas //
T02D2669:193b-26: kha cig dag ni mche ba gtsigs //
T02D2669:193b-27: zhes pa'i bar du gsungs pa ste //
T02D2669:193b-28: de ltar cho ga bzhi bsams nas //
T02D2669:193b-30: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i yi dags dngos su 'dri nus sam mi nus kyang rung ste //
T02D2669:193b-31: sngags brjod de bsams zhes pa ste /
T02D2669:193b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin bris nas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2669:193b-33: mjug tu khro bo gshin rje gshed //
T02D2669:193b-34: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni ri mo la
T02D2669:193b-35: sogs pa'i 'og tu khro bo nyid kyi sngags kyi
T02D2669:193b-36: le'u gsungs pa'i sbyan drang pa'i sngags brjod de /
T02D2669:193b-37: padma'i snying por bzhugs su gsol zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:193b-38: yang na mjug tu zhes pa ni rig sngags 'chang
T02D2669:193b-39: dang por khro bo nyid du bsgoms nas yan lag
T02D2669:193b-40: lnga pa'i sngags kyis bsrung ba'i 'og tu zhes pa'o
T02D2669:193b-41: // dad pa'i lha'i rang bzhin bsgom pa yang mdog dang /
T02D2669:193b-43: zhal gyi dbyibs kyi dbye ba dang /
T02D2669:193b-44: gsungs te go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D2669:194a-1: la khyad par ni kha cig bzhad pa zhes pa rtsa ba'i zhal te /
T02D2669:194a-2: gang rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2669:194a-3: kha cig zhi zhes pa ste steng gi zhal te rang bzhin tha mal gnas pa'o //
T02D2669:194a-4: kha cig 'jigs par bgrad ces pa g-yas pa dang po ste zhal gyi dbyibs phyir bgrad pa'o //
T02D2669:194a-5: de'i gnyis pa'i zhal gdangs pa'o //
T02D2669:194a-6: ljags rkyong ba ni g-yon dang po'o //
T02D2669:194a-7: mche ba gtsigs pa ni g-yon gnyis pa'o //
T02D2669:194a-8: de ltar snying po legs par ni //
T02D2669:194a-10: me tog gis ni bkad ste gzhug / ces pa'i
T02D2669:194a-11: bar du mchod pa zhes pa ston te sngags kyis
T02D2669:194a-14: dri dang sbyar ba'i chus ya m'anta ka'i sa ra brjod pa'i cho gas zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02D2669:194a-15: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su yi dags kyi spyi
T02D2669:194a-16: bor dbus kyi yi dags dgug pa'i sngags brjod de
T02D2669:194a-17: / me tog dmar po gtor te bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2669:194a-18: de nas sngags kyi le'u gsungs pa'i mchod pa'i sngags
T02D2669:194a-19: rnams kyi dril sogs pa dbul zhes pa'i tha tshig
T02D2669:194a-20: go // rang gi snying po'i sngags kyis kyang //
T02D2669:194a-22: me tog dang dag gis dgod par bya //
T02D2669:194a-23: zhes pa'i bar du ni bsrung ba'i cho ga dag bstan te /
T02D2669:194a-24: skabs 'di tshig lhag ma dag gis sngar gyi don bstan to //
T02D2669:194a-25: de ltar ci rigs mchod nas kyang //
T02D2669:194a-27: me tog cho ga bzhin phul nas //
T02D2669:194a-28: zhes pa'i tshig dang 'brel par shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:194a-29: de nas mar me rab 'bar ba //
T02D2669:194a-30: phyogs brgyad du yang dgod par bya //
T02D2669:194a-31: zhes pa ni sngar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams
T02D2669:194a-32: su mar me 'bar ba brgyad bkod par bya ba
T02D2669:194a-33: de bdug pa'i rjes la dbul lo zhes pa'i tha
T02D2669:194a-34: tshig go // de nas gtor ma dbul te /
T02D2669:194a-35: 'byung po gtor ma khro bo la //
T02D2669:194a-36: zhes pa'i gong du sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2669:194a-37: khro bo la phul nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2669:194a-38: dbus kyi khro bo la 'byung po'i gtor ma phul
T02D2669:194a-39: nas so // yi dags phal chen gyis zhes pa
T02D2669:194a-40: la sogs pa ni grva'i dbyug pa bzhi la gtor
T02D2669:194b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir yi dags kyi phreng ba bkod pa la gtor ma @194b dbul ba'o //
T02D2669:194b-1: khro bo gtso bo la phyogs te //
T02D2669:194b-2: de nas yang ni bdug pa dbul //
T02D2669:194b-4: gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams las gang yang
T02D2669:194b-5: rung ba cig tu be con la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2669:194b-6: ma'i phyag rgya dag bris shing mchod pa'i yo byad
T02D2669:194b-8: de ltar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang khro bo
T02D2669:194b-9: rnams kyi bdag po gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor de la
T02D2669:194b-10: slob ma rnams dal du gzhug pa'i phyir /
T02D2669:194b-11: dang por sna 'dren du lha la rgyab kyis ma
T02D2669:194b-12: phyogs par dang por thad kar sngon du bltas nas
T02D2669:194b-15: de yi phyi rol chu bcas snod //
T02D2669:194b-16: ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol bdag
T02D2669:194b-17: gi g-yon rol du dri'i chu dang ldan pa'i mchod
T02D2669:194b-18: yon gyi snod me tog dang ldan pa yang gzhag
T02D2669:194b-19: par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2669:194b-20: me tog gis ni bkang ste bzhag / ces pa
T02D2669:194b-21: la rnam pa gcig tu mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
T02D2669:194b-22: / me tog gis snod bkang ba yang gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2669:194b-23: 'di man chad ni slob ma sngar bcug nas phyag
T02D2669:194b-24: rgya dang dam tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2669:194b-25: to // cho gas khrus byas smyung ba yi //
T02D2669:194b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni cho ga bzhin du khrus byas shing /
T02D2669:194b-27: smyung ba byas pa'i slob ma gcig dkyil 'khor gyi drung du bkug nas /
T02D2669:194b-28: de nas khro bo'i yan lag sngags rnams kyis slob
T02D2669:194b-29: ma de dag gnas lnga la sogs pa bsams te
T02D2669:194b-30: / slob ma de gzi byin du bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2669:194b-31: khro bo yi ni snying po yis //
T02D2669:194b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ltar slob
T02D2669:194b-33: ma bsrungs shing gzi byin can du byas pa'i 'og
T02D2669:194b-34: tu snying po 'bru bcu bdun pa'am /
T02D2669:194b-35: 'bru bdun pa gang yang rung ba cig brjod nas /
T02D2669:194b-36: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyor te dam tshig gi
T02D2669:194b-37: phyag rgya 'ching du bcug nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2669:194b-38: pa'i me tog lag tu sbyin no //
T02D2669:194b-39: slob ma der dar ram ras dmar pos mig dgab par bya'o //

T02D2669:201a-33: rgyal po'i sngags te mthu can nam gzi byin can
T02D2669:201a-34: du 'gyur ro // de nas gzhan pa'i sngags spel byed //
T02D2669:201a-39: zhes pa ni sngags spel zhing rgyas par byed pa'o //
T02D2669:201a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig nyid //
T02D2669:201a-41: gsum pa yin par yongs su bsgrags //
T02D2669:201a-42: zhes pa bar gyi aa gnyis las dang po'i shos
T02D2669:201a-43: ni gong du sngags rnam gnyis las 'das pa gtogs
T02D2669:201a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi sngags yin par bstan to //
T02D2669:201b-0: @201b sngags kyis bskul pa'i tshig dag 'dir //
T02D2669:201b-1: zhes pa khro bo chen po 'bar ba zhes bya
T02D2669:201b-2: ba dag 'byung ba'i be con gyi sngags la bya'o
T02D2669:201b-3: // dngos grub ster ba bzhi pa ste /
T02D2669:201b-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes pa /
T02D2669:201b-5: de nas sngags kyi rang dngos so //
T02D2669:201b-6: zhes ba bar gyi aa gnyis la be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags la /
T02D2669:201b-7: sarba ta th'a ga ta kro dha bhi dza ya zhes pa la sogs pas bskul nas /
T02D2669:201b-8: dngos grub ster bar mdzad par gtogs par gzhag pa'o //
T02D2669:201b-9: de'i 'og tu 'di la sogs pa'i sngags gong ma
T02D2669:201b-10: rnams ni be con gyi phyag rgya nyid kyi sngags
T02D2669:201b-11: so // mjug gi h'um ni khro bo yi //
T02D2669:201b-12: sngags ni 'phel bar byed par bshad //
T02D2669:201b-13: ces pa mjug gi h'um thung du shos ni sngags
T02D2669:201b-14: rnams 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang gzi can du byed
T02D2669:201b-15: do // de las gzhan ni khyad par du //
T02D2669:201b-16: rang gi bskul ba'i tshig gis byed //
T02D2669:201b-17: ces pa la h'um thung du shos ni de las
T02D2669:201b-18: gzhan pa la mjug gi h'um ring po shos kyi
T02D2669:201b-19: ni dbang dang zhi rgyas la sogs pa'i las 'og
T02D2669:201b-20: nas 'byung ba rnams kyi bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan
T02D2669:201b-21: par byas na / sngags rnams 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /
T02D2669:201b-22: gzi can du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2669:201b-23: dbang gi ngo bo smos pa ni //
T02D2669:201b-24: zhes pa ni dbang du bya ba lha la sogs
T02D2669:201b-25: pa'i gang dang gang de'i ming nas brjod de de'i
T02D2669:201b-26: bskul tshig dang / mtha' mar sv'a h'a mthar sbyar te bzlas te zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:201b-27: phat byung na be con gyi sngags nyams par 'gyur
T02D2669:201b-28: bas mi 'byung bar h'um ring po'i 'og tu so
T02D2669:201b-29: so'i bskul tshig bcug ste nges par bya'o //
T02D2669:201b-30: mi mthun par bshad pa ni 'og ma ltar mi rung ngo //
T02D2669:201b-31: gong du smos pa'i be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags
T02D2669:201b-32: kyi mjug la h'um gnyis kyi bar na phat yod
T02D2669:201b-33: pa ni drag shul gyi yin pas zhi ba dang
T02D2669:201b-35: dbang gi las rnams la ni mi sbyor ro //
T02D2669:201b-36: de ltar ma sbyor na yang be con gyi sngags
T02D2669:201b-37: bcad pa'i kha ma bskongs pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur
T02D2669:201b-38: zhes zer ro // zhi ba'i phyir ni bskul ba nyid //
T02D2669:201b-39: mjug tu boo shat btags par bya //
T02D2669:201b-40: zhes pa su la bya ba'i ming h'um gi 'og
T02D2669:201b-41: tu bcug la de nas bskul ba'i tshig gzhug go
T02D2669:202a-0: // de bas na drag shul la @202a * //
T02D2669:202a-1: sogs pa gang la sbyar ba la 'byung ba de bzhin du sbyor te las bya'o //
T02D2669:202a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung //
T02D2669:202a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyas pa ni rgyas pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2669:202a-4: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyas pa'o //
T02D2669:202a-5: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyas pa bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02D2669:202a-6: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthar bla
T02D2669:202a-7: na med pa'i sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa man chad
T02D2669:202a-8: dang / 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa de las gong ma med pa'i rgyas pa ni /
T02D2669:202a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba ste /
T02D2669:202a-10: de bsgrub par 'dod pas sngags 'di bzlas so //
T02D2669:202a-11: rgyas pa'i phyir ni sngon bzhin du //
T02D2669:202a-12: zhes pa 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i rgyas pa'o //
T02D2669:202a-13: rgyas phyir bskul ba'i thog ma dang //
T02D2669:202a-14: zhes pa g-yul las rgyal bar byed 'dod dam /
T02D2669:202a-15: shags las rgyal bar byed par 'dod na zhes pa'o //
T02D2669:202a-16: khro bo h'um ni tha mar sbyar //
T02D2669:202a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa ni drag po'i tshig tu zad do //
T02D2669:202a-18: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho gar grags //
T02D2669:202a-19: zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa'i tshul de lta
T02D2669:202a-20: bu dag gi gsang ba'i mchod par grags pa yin
T02D2669:202a-21: no // da ni phyi'i mchod pa'i sgo nas mjug
T02D2669:202a-22: sdud cing phan yon smos pa zhes pa bshad de
T02D2669:202a-23: no // / de ltar mchod pa'i rim pa der //
T02D2669:202a-24: be con dag ni byas par 'gyur //
T02D2669:202a-26: 'di ni gong du smos pa rnams kyi mjug sdud pa rnams kyi tshig ste /
T02D2669:202a-27: de ltar ni be con gyi phyag rgya mandal der
T02D2669:202a-28: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rim pa de byas par rdzogs
T02D2669:202a-29: par 'gyur ba yin no zhes mjug sdud de /
T02D2669:202a-30: be con gyi mandal dag gis rdzogs so //
T02D2669:202a-31: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2669:202a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ni gsang ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2669:202a-33: ldan pa des na ji ltar 'dod pa las dang /
T02D2669:202a-34: byed ces pa dang sbyar te /
T02D2669:202a-35: de bzhin du phyi'i mchod pa me tog la sogs
T02D2669:202a-36: pa las so so'i kha dog dang ro tsam gyis
T02D2669:202a-37: na mchod pa sbyar bas las byed do //
T02D2669:202a-39: zhes pa la sogs pa ni bzlas pa'i grangs dang /
T02D2669:202a-40: dus chad pa bzhin du ma bzlas kyang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang ldan na /
T02D2669:202b-1: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul dag dang //
T02D2669:202b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dbang du bya ba
T02D2669:202b-3: la sogs pa'i las de rnams ji skad bshad pa'i
T02D2669:202b-4: chul bzhin du gsang ba'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba de
T02D2669:202b-5: 'dra ba dang ldan pa des ni /
T02D2669:202b-8: nad kyi dus dang smyung ba dag kyang mi dgos par bsgrub pa des shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:202b-9: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor legs byas pa //
T02D2669:202b-10: zhes pa la sogs pa sgrub pa po de gsang
T02D2669:202b-11: ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga yang zhes be con gyi
T02D2669:202b-12: dkyil 'khor du legs par dbang bskur bas khrus la
T02D2669:202b-13: sogs pa ma byas pa dang /
T02D2669:202b-14: ci 'dod dgu rang nyams su spyod ces pa'i don to //
T02D2669:202b-15: ci yang rung bar gtor ma dang //
T02D2669:202b-16: zhes pa lha bshos dang gtor ma mchod pa'i yo
T02D2669:202b-17: byad 'di rung 'di mi rung 'dam ka med do
T02D2669:202b-18: // gang gis zhes pa bsgrub pa gang gis bsgrub
T02D2669:202b-19: pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i so so'i las bya'o zhes
T02D2669:202b-20: // pa'i // mchod pa byed pa zhes pa sngags dang gsum kas mchod do zhes bya'o //
T02D2669:202b-21: byang chub ces pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2669:202b-23: rab tu gus pa'i zla ba drug gis zhes pa
T02D2669:202b-24: de 'dra ba'i tshul du zla ba drug tu gus
T02D2669:202b-25: pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:202b-26: de ni ci 'dod dgos pa rnyed //
T02D2669:202b-27: ces bya dbang du bya ba'i las la sogs pa
T02D2669:202b-28: 'di dag byed pa'i cho ga gong du smos pa'i
T02D2669:202b-29: las kyi dkyil 'khor de rnams las gang yang rung
T02D2669:202b-30: ba bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor de bris pa las bsgrub
T02D2669:202b-31: pa ni be con gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D2669:202b-32: ba'i sgrub pa pos las kyi dkyil 'khor ma byas
T02D2669:202b-33: kyang bskur ba'i tshig dang ldan par so so'i las
T02D2669:202b-34: bya'o // bzhi pa'i las bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2669:202b-36: // / da ni be con gyi phyag rgyar gtogs pa'i
T02D2669:202b-37: spyi'i rgyud las sgrub thabs gong ma las 'byung ba'i
T02D2669:202b-38: cho ga de dag 'dir bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2669:202b-39: bsgrub pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2669:202b-40: bsgrub pa sngags spel ba dang /
T02D2669:202b-41: sngags ma spel bar tha mal bar bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2669:202b-42: de la dang por ni sngags ma spel bar tha mal bar bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2669:202b-43: de la dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad de //
T02D2669:202b-44: de nas be con phyag rgya yi //
T02D2669:203a-2: zhes pa'i bar gyis de la dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad do zhes pa bstan to //
T02D2669:203a-3: de yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gzhan //
T02D2669:203a-4: zhes pa la sogs pa ni be con gyi phyag
T02D2669:203a-5: rgya'i dkyil 'khor gong ma las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2669:203a-7: dkyil na yi dags zhes bya la /
T02D2669:203a-8: be con gyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2669:203a-9: ming yang dkyil na yi dags zhes bya ba'i dkyil
T02D2669:203a-10: 'khor ro // sgrub pa mtshan mo dur khrod du //
T02D2669:203a-11: zhes sgrub pa pos mtshan mo dur khrod kyi gnas
T02D2669:203a-12: su dur khrod kyi thal pa sngar smos pa'i bsgrub
T02D2669:203a-14: sgo gzhan bcad la lho phyogs kyi sgo phye ste bsgrub pa dang mchod pa dag bya'o //
T02D2669:203a-15: dur khrod dag gi tha ba yis //
T02D2669:203a-16: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par //
T02D2669:203a-17: zhes ba dur khrod rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2669:203a-18: ro bsregs pa'i dur khrod dang /
T02D2669:203a-19: ro ma bsregs pa'i dur khrod de /
T02D2669:203a-20: de lta bu'i gnas su phyin te /
T02D2669:203a-21: nyi ma ma nub par dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2669:203a-22: nyi ma nub nas bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2669:203a-23: mi ro dang thod pa 'di dag kyang phyag rgya'i mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2669:203a-24: mi ro ro smad dag dang ldan //
T02D2669:203a-25: zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma 'dab ma
T02D2669:203a-26: brgyad pa bris la de'i dbus su mi ro mgo
T02D2669:203a-27: med pa'i ro stod shar phyogs su bstan pa rkang
T02D2669:203a-28: pa nub phyogs su 'dug par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2669:203a-29: mi ro la yang thal bas ri mo bya'o //
T02D2669:203a-30: bla re rnga yab me long dril //
T02D2669:203a-31: zhes pa zla ba dang zla ba phyed pa la bya'o //
T02D2669:203a-32: me tog phreng bas mdzes par byas //
T02D2669:203a-33: zhes pa la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor de nyid lha rdzas zhes bya ste /
T02D2669:203a-34: bzang po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2669:203a-35: dkyil 'khor bzang po'i nang rim gyis /
T02D2669:203a-36: phyogs bzhir mgo lus tshang ba'i yi dags gcig la gcig 'brel bar chur 'khor bar bri'o //
T02D2669:203a-37: nang gi ngos bzhi dang grva bzhir yi dags thod pa brgyad bri ste /
T02D2669:203a-38: des dkyil 'khor bris pa'i 'og tu dbus kyi yi
T02D2669:203a-39: dags kyi dur khrod kyi thal bas be con gyi
T02D2669:203a-40: chad zungs kyis bdag la lta bar bri'o //
T02D2669:203b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga de dag kyang sngar @203b
T02D2669:203b-1: bsnyen par byed pa'i tshe ni cho ga 'di bzhin
T02D2669:203b-2: du dur khrod kyi thal bas bri'o //
T02D2669:203b-3: bsgrub pa'i tshe ni dkyil 'khor du dur khrod kyi thal bas bris la yi dags dang /
T02D2669:203b-4: thod pa rnams rnyed na cho ga bzhin du dngos su gzhag go //
T02D2669:203b-5: be con gyi phyag rgya yang gser dngul dang /
T02D2669:203b-8: seng ldeng las legs par byas pa dongs su gzhag la bsgrub po //
T02D2669:203b-9: dkyil na yi dags zhes bya ba'i //
T02D2669:203b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yi dags lte
T02D2669:203b-11: ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par
T02D2669:203b-12: byed pa'i dkyil 'khor der khro bo'i rnal 'byor dang
T02D2669:203b-13: ldan pas mchod pa bya'o zhes 'og nas 'byung ba'i
T02D2669:203b-15: khro bo gtso bo'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2669:203b-16: mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa byas //
T02D2669:203b-17: zhes pa sgrub pa po'i bdag nyid khro bo'i rnal
T02D2669:203b-18: 'byor dang ldan pas dkyil na yi dags zhes bya'o
T02D2669:203b-19: // dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa dag gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2669:203b-20: mchod pa la sogs pa bsnyen pa sngar byas nas
T02D2669:203b-21: da ni yo byad la sogs pa zhes bya ba
T02D2669:203b-22: bshad do // sme gtor thams cad sbyin nas ni //
T02D2669:203b-23: zhes pa sha khrag la sogs pa'i sme gtor gyis dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug phab ste /
T02D2669:203b-25: btsang ma'i cho ga bgos nas kyang //
T02D2669:203b-26: zhes pa sgrub pa pos phyi nang gi gtsang sbra
T02D2669:203b-27: dang lan pa des khro bo'i skur bsgyur la cho
T02D2669:203b-28: ga la sogs pa'i sngags kyis kyang cho ga bzhin
T02D2669:203b-29: du bsrungs la sgrub pa bos sngar bsnyen pa 'bum
T02D2669:203b-30: bya'o // bsnyen pa bya ba'i sngags kyang be con
T02D2669:203b-31: gyi phyag rgya'i sngags khro bo'i rgyal po'i bar du
T02D2669:203b-32: bya'o // bcug ste / sngags spel ba ma yin
T02D2669:203b-33: ba sngar gong du phyag rgya bcing pa'i skabs su
T02D2669:203b-34: be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags ma spel ba de
T02D2669:203b-36: bsnyen ba'i sa ni gang yang rung ba'i gnas dben pa gcig tu bya'o //
T02D2669:203b-37: byas nas 'di dag brtsam par bya //
T02D2669:203b-38: zhes bsngar bsnyen pa 'bum byas nas /
T02D2669:203b-39: de'i 'og tu yo byad 'di dag la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2669:203b-40: shis pa'i thod pas bkab nas ni //
T02D2669:203b-41: zhes ba la sogs pa ni rigs mthon po'i thod pa ma chag pa /
T02D2669:203b-43: dung gi mdog 'dra ba phyi byad byas la bkra
T02D2669:204a-0: shis pa'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba @204a *
T02D2669:204a-1: // dang mi sha dag kyang bsag par bya'o //
T02D2669:204a-2: phyugs chen dag gi tshil bu las //
T02D2669:204a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa ni mi'i tshil bzhu ba'i
T02D2669:204a-4: mar me dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim gyi
T02D2669:204a-5: phyogs bzhi dang mtshams bzhir bkod ba byas te /
T02D2669:204a-6: de yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab ste /
T02D2669:204a-8: cho ga zhes pa de lta bur //
T02D2669:204a-10: mi 'grub pa mi las rnams kyang //
T02D2669:204a-11: zhes pa la sogs pa'i bar gyis sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing /
T02D2669:204a-12: sngags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga de ltar brtsams nas
T02D2669:204a-13: grogs dang ldan pas bsgrub pa 'jug pa zhes bya
T02D2669:204a-14: ba bshad do // byas nas bsgrub la 'jug par bya //
T02D2669:204a-15: dpal ldan gos ni dmar po gyon //
T02D2669:204a-16: zhes pa sgrub pa pos ras sam dar la sogs
T02D2669:204a-17: pa dmar po'i gos gyon pa'i dbang du bya ba'i
T02D2669:204a-18: don to // tsandan dmar po bskus nas ni //
T02D2669:204a-19: zhes pa sgrub pa pos khrus byas nas /
T02D2669:204a-20: lus la tsandan dmar pos bsku'o //
T02D2669:204a-21: cung zad dag kyang mi byed par sgrub pa pos
T02D2669:204a-22: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i las gzhan ci yang mi byed
T02D2669:204a-23: par ro // mar gyi brgyad la gcig pus so //
T02D2669:204a-24: zhes mar gyi tshes nyi shu gsum gyi nub mo mtshan gcig dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bsgrub po //
T02D2669:204a-25: tshes grangs kyi drag po dang sbyar ro //
T02D2669:204a-26: dpa' la sems drag mthu dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2669:204a-27: grogs ni gsum dang ldan par bsgrub par bya //
T02D2669:204a-28: zhes pa grogs po gsum dang ldan par bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2669:204a-29: grogs po'i mtshan nyid kyang 'di dag grogs por gzung ngo //
T02D2669:204a-30: blo dang ldan pa sems drag cing //
T02D2669:204a-31: dbang po bsdams pa'i sgrub ba po //
T02D2669:204a-32: zhes ba sgrub pa po dag mtshan nyid 'di 'dra
T02D2669:204a-33: ba dang ldan zhing sems yul la spro bar bsdams
T02D2669:204a-34: pa / yi dags kyi ni dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2669:204a-35: sgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya //
T02D2669:204a-36: grogs po gsum gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra ba dang /
T02D2669:204a-37: sgrub pa po nyid kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu
T02D2669:204a-38: dang ldan pas yi dags lte ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D2669:204a-39: dkyil 'khor du sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes
T02D2669:204a-40: pa'o // de nas mtshan mo phyag rgya bcing //
T02D2669:204a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa ni bsgrub pa'i mtshan mo khro bo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas nas /
T02D2669:204b-0: stan @204b gyi steng du dang po skyil mo krung
T02D2669:204b-1: du 'dug pa la mi g-yo mi 'gul brtan par
T02D2669:204b-2: 'dug pa las be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags lhag
T02D2669:204b-6: zhes pa be con gyi phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2669:204b-7: mi 'grub pa yi las rnams gyang //
T02D2669:204b-8: zhes pa be con gyi phyag rgya grub zin phan chad bsgrub par dka' ba'i las rnams kyang /
T02D2669:204b-9: de phan chad thogs pa med par grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2669:204b-10: de nas thogs pa med par byed //
T02D2669:204b-12: de nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na //
T02D2669:204b-13: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'di man chad bsgrubs nas las mang po bya bar bshad do //
T02D2669:204b-14: de nas thogs pa med par byed //
T02D2669:204b-15: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi khro bo yis //
T02D2669:204b-16: zhes pa khro bo'i rnal 'byor dang yang ldan la

T02D2669:214a-31: 'jam dpal gyi mthus bskul bar de ltar 'gyur ba'o //
